awe6.core.drivers.AFactory

type
class
implements
awe6.interfaces.IDisposable
awe6.interfaces.IFactory
The AFactory class provides a minimalist abstract implementation of the IFactory interface.

It is intended as an abstract class to be extended by target specific drivers.

For API documentation please review the corresponding Interfaces.

Constructor

new(p_context : awe6.core.Context, ?p_isDebug : Bool, ?p_config : String)
